mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, u.account, u.password, u.role, u.created_time, u.updated_time, COALESCE(up.status, 0) AS status FROM user u LEFT JOIN user_profile up ON u.user_id = up.user_id WHERE u.account = #{account}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (user_id, account, password, role) VALUES (#{userId}, #{account}, #{password}, #{role})
